error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'total_pigeons' (value: 70) was used instead of 'black_pigeons' (value: 35.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 7
Black:70/2=<<70/2=35>>35 pigeons
Black Male: 70(0.2)=14 pigeons
35-14=<<35-14=21>>21 female black pigeon
There are 21-14=<<21-14=7>>7 more black female pigeons
